document_data.caption: A map of the Cities of the Pantheon showing Al-Muti river in the north.
document_data.name: Al-Muti River
document_data.region: [[Cities of the Pantheon]], [[Cities of the Heart]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Muti River''', also called the '''River of Generosity''', was found along the border of the [[Cities of the Heart]] and the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] in [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography:
Al-Muti River formed a rough border between the northern Cities of the Heart and southern Cities of the Pantheon regions. The river originated in the foothills found between [[Al-Sayaj Mountains|Al-Sayaj]] and [[Al-Akara Mountains|Al-Akara]] mountains. Al-Muti flowed west to empty into the [[Golden Gulf]].

The settlement of [[Talab]] was found near its origin point while the great city of [[Hilm]] lay on its southern bank where it met the Golden Gulf.
